Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some 63rd-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier door problem on a train at Laramie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some 63rd-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier door problem on a train at Laramie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
